description: This file contains unit tests for the CSVReader and CSVUrlReader classes, including tests for reading CSV files from paths, file objects, URLs, and handling chunked and paginated reading, as well as asynchronous operations.

classes.name: CSVReader
classes.description: A class responsible for reading CSV files from various sources, supporting synchronous and asynchronous operations, chunking, and pagination.

classes.name: CSVUrlReader
classes.description: A class responsible for reading CSV data directly from URLs, supporting both sync and async methods.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads CSV data from a file path or file-like object, returning a list of Document objects.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads CSV data from a file path or URL, supporting pagination and chunking.

methods.name: chunk_document
methods.description: Method used to split a Document into chunks if chunking is enabled.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads CSV data from a URL, returning Document objects.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads CSV data from a URL.
